author: Staff Reporter
text:
Rope car service to Dhandayuthapaniswamy Temple was suspended as wind velocity was beyond permissible level here on Thursday morning.

Ground engineers stopped the rope car as the wind velocity was more than 20 kmph. Later, the velocity rose to 50 km per hour. The officials said the service could be resumed only when the wind velocity came down to around 10 km. Later in the evening, the service resumed.
title: Rope car service to temple suspended
